item.title: UGC Video Creation Must be 30+ Years old - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a skincare fanatic UGC creator? We are looking for males and females with fine lines and wrinkles around their eyes ages 30+ to create Instagram reels real review style videos 45 seconds or less. Free product plus $15 pay! Due within 7 days of receiving the serum.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Instagram
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Instagram
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Videographer for watches website., 2 videos: 1) rotating angle of the watch 2) infinity zooming - Upwork
item.description:
we need 2 videos for our watches website.
first video must be identical (with our watch instead..) of this one on this homepage:
https://laventure.swiss/en
We are not sure if the watch is real, a rendering or an hybrid...would be good to know.
Second video is more creative and infinity zooming will be the core of it.
We will have the final prototype of the watch in July but if we can do something already with a rendering, that would be great.


Hourly Range: $50.00-$130.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 20:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Product Photography, Lifestyle, Fashion & Beauty, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Product Photography, Lifestyle, Fashion & Beauty, Videography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
